abstract: Letter from New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo comments on Aug 20 editorial questioning his commitment to new Amtrak rail tunnel under Hudson River.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo writes that he “vigorously” supports a new rail tunnel under the Hudson and says a federal commitment is necessary.

headline.main: From Governor Cuomo: Build a New Rail Tunnel
headline.print_headline: From Governor Cuomo: Build a New Rail Tunnel

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo writes that he “vigorously” supports a new rail tunnel under the Hudson and says a federal commitment is necessary.
